summary: This is a brief email from 2019 regarding technical issues with surveillance cameras in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at a correctional facility, specifically noting the ability to monitor but not record. The document appears to be internal facility correspondence.

events.title: SHU Camera Recording Issue Reported
events.description: An internal email reports a technical issue where cameras in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) can be monitored but not recorded.

keyFacts: On February 19, 2019, an internal email reported a technical malfunction with surveillance cameras in a Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The issue specifically involved the cameras' ability to be monitored in real-time but not to record footage.
The document is internal operational correspondence, not a legal filing or investigative report related to the Epstein case itself.
